meanings.definition: The office or position of an imam.
meanings.sent1: In some countries, the imamates are highly respected leaders in the community.
meanings.sent2: The imamates play a crucial role in guiding the members of the mosque.
meanings.sent3: The imamates decided to have a picnic in the park to relax after a busy week.
meanings.sent4: Her imamates shone brightly, illuminating the path for others to follow.
meanings.sent5: The imamates stood tall, symbolizing strength and wisdom.

meanings.definition: The territory or jurisdiction of an imam.
meanings.sent1: The imamates expanded to include neighboring villages under their rule.
meanings.sent2: People living within the imamates were governed by the imam's laws.
meanings.sent3: The imamates hosted a grand feast to celebrate their unity and prosperity.
meanings.sent4: The imamates embraced all who sought refuge within their borders.
meanings.sent5: The imamates stretched far and wide, encompassing diverse cultures and traditions.
